info.name: Helpdesk Service - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete Postman collection for Helpdesk Service with all controllers and endpoints

request.description: Create a new issue ticket

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Network connectivity issue",
  "description": "Unable to connect to network",
  "priority": "{{issuePriority}}",
  "relatedService": "{{relatedService}}",
  "reportedBy": "{{reportedBy}}"
}
